amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to deploy disaster liaisons when requested by a Governor or appropriate State agency in a federally declared disaster area.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3659 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3659 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S9209; text: CR S9209) To require the Secretary of Agriculture to deploy disaster liaisons when requested by a Governor or appropriate State agency in a federally declared disaster area.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3659 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Talent.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3659 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
